ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] bah numbers
ygData.msgSnippet: I m not sure I understand the numbers here.  Looks like 68 per tick which is still great damage (I do about 14-15 with my barbed leather whip at 14th lvl)
ygData.messageBody:
I'm not sure I understand the numbers here. Looks
like 68 per tick which is still great damage (I do
about 14-15 with my barbed leather whip at 14th lvl)

Question though -- I recently tried to see how much
COD does during combat. Disbanded with my best
hunting buddy, both us us hit duel and ... COD didn't
affect him at all. I would play (with mandolin and
without) and the song would simply end a tick later.

What went wrong?

I am really curious about maxing damage in combat. If
COD only does 2 damage per round, regardless of level
(without instrument) then it's probably only useful
below 10th lvl.

I did use COD a lot at 3rd-12th lvl and,while I had to
be careful, had good results. At 14th lvl tho, I seem
to do better using bellow. Opinions?

Tyunes, Bard of the near-useless 14th Song
Rodcet Nife


--- Danny Craigg <danny@...> wrote:
> The three AE DoT's (2, 18, 48) are all or nothing.
> Twist the three
> together, and you're doing 120+ points per tick...
> not bad for a bard.
>
> Raiel
>
>
